IGNITE-5468
body: IGNITE-5468: Added the ability to set IGNITE_SQL_MERGE_TABLE_MAX_SIZE and IGNITE_SQL_MERGE_TABLE_PREFETCH_SIZE via cache configuration

title: IGNITE-5425 JDBC thin: support client info

IGNITE-5552: ServiceProcessor recalculates all service assignments even if there is a pending topology change
IGNITE-5567
body:
Added benchmarks which compare a performance of Ignite.reentrantLock and IgniteCache.lock in three use-cases.
1) Atomic increment operation.
2) Only get a lock and immediately unlock.
3) Atomic increment over random keys.

title: IGNITE-5409: JDBC thin: support schema in query string

new method in MarshallerContext interface to register mappings locally

IGNITE-2894
body:
- Add support the Externalizable interface in BinaryMarshaller.
- 103(Object) type used for Externalizable objects.
- No queries support by fields of Externalizable objects such as QuerySqlField. Because Externalizable objects are processed now as binary objects similarly Binarylizable objects with a raw writer format.
